title: SWE: The Breakup
itunes:title: SWE: The Breakup
itunes:subtitle: Emily and Menace talk to Rebecca Sussman, author of "The Breakup Bible," to learn how to move through breakups in a more healthy, constructive way. Clipping coupons on the first date, free plastic surgery for Brazil's poor,...
description:
Emily talks to Rachel A Sussman, author of "The Breakup Bible," to learn how to move through breakups in a more healthy, constructive way. Rachel talks about the huge mistakes women make during breakups, taking accountability, and creating a 'Personal Love Map' to understand your breakup patterns and yourself better. Debate: using coupons on the first date, free plastic surgery for Brazil's poor, giving up the Internet for sex, profuse sweating during sex, losing an erection, and the importance of confidence.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
